---
title: "hobo-files"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

.hobo files are original files offloaded from a sensor, and show real-time graphs of temperature and soil moisture conditions.

.hobo files can be opened using HOBOware, which can be downloaded from http://www.onsetcomp.com/hoboware-free-download.
